website_summaries.verdict: The best choice if you're looking for a unique option in LED, multi-color, dimmable smart lighting. Works similarly to LIFX bulbs but is versatile in places where alternative lighting is needed.
pros: Easy to set up and practical for numerous uses
Can be placed in awkward spaces and used for highlighting
Millions of possible colors and 16 color zones
cons: Doesn't connect well to all devices or routers, and occasionally loses connection
Doesn't attach well to some surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Forget Hue ... buy LIFX!
customer_reviews.text: Love the strips from LIFX Z .... .these lights with the app are awesome! I have over 48 bulls and 4 zones of strips in my condo! I used the strips for for my windows ...awesome product. I have 3 more kits to by and will have all the windows done! Perfect for setting the mood, a party, or just supporting your sports team during a game!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: We installed them over our closet and they look great. They match the other lifx bulbs color perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These lights are badass. We installed them over our closet and they look great. They match the other lifx bulbs color perfectly. Make sure you have an easy time resetting them though. We set ours up in a hard to reach place and I have to 'reset' them at least once a week. I don't blame the lights, I think it has to do with my WiFi router. I wish they were longer and cost a bit less, but these are top of the line LEDs. I'll likely be picking up 4 more for the kitchen over/under counter lights.
customer_reviews.author: Puka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lighting for ambiance. Bending too much can break it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Adds a nice ambiance to the room. I have it along the back of my desk. Lights up nicely. Warning though...don't bend the strips too much. You'll end up breaking the LED. They're not very flexible when it comes to 90 degree corners. Also, the adhesive isn't that great on all surfaces. On the metal back of my one tv, sticks great. On the wood material along the back of my desk it doesn't stick well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors but highly unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately too often these lights have to be unplugged and plugged back in because they lose connectivity. I passed the return period because I was gullible enough to think they could fix this problem through a firmware update. Now I'm stuck with them. Awfully high priced for the reliability issues. Also the lights will flash at random times when off, very very annoying and somewhat startling.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: No hub required, simple setup, eye popping colours!
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased a Phillips Hue light strip set, but didn't realize that the Hub isn't included and is a extra $50 purchase! Came across these from through a YouTube video and purchased them immediately. Setup was quick and simple on my Moto Z Play, the application works perfectly, and the different scenes, integration with Amazon Alexa, and IFTTT make these a winner in my book. Absolutely love my LIFX Z LED strips and will DEFINITELY grab more LIFX products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Kloepfer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lights that transform a space.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Love LIFX products, they are fantastic. They look great, output a good amount of light, a ton of colors and customization options. Exactly what I was looking for, and easy to use and set-up, sometimes the Android app isn't fantastic on older or less robust phones; but on our latest Samsung it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Annoyingly Bad Adhesive, Great Lights Though.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are great and really bright but the adhesive tends to unstick quite often from the tv I've put it on. It would have been nice if Lifx made some L-shape extenders to go around tv's and cabinets so you don't have to cut the strip and have a bunch unused. If you want to put it on your tv just cut it so it's straight across the tv and not turning in any way since it will unstick :(
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking led strip with glaring issues.
customer_reviews.text: This led strip is bright and had brilliant colors, but also has some issues. I applied it to my wall above the base board, ordered it in place only to find out had come off over night. As well, I turned the strip on for overnight it go to turn it off with the app and it is not responding at all... The app is very unreliable and finicky. It often freezes up and does not respond. This is a shame because it is a good lo something is recommend...oking led strip, but it's not
customer_reviews.author: Matthew O. Evans

customer_reviews.title: These are cool!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought 3 ($90 per set; 6ft of strip each set) sets of these. 2 worked great, one was damaged and wouldnt connect. LIFX basically sent me a brand new set of lights at no cost. The initial connection process can be daunting but once these are set up theyre great. They can flicker, move to music and much more. I only removed a star because they are hella expensive for the length and you would spend a ton on trying to light an entire home with these even only in accent areas.
customer_reviews.author: James Purefoy Jr

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product, Good Customer Service, Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat overpriced. The actual product does not feel as premium as other LIFX product. One of the strips provided was faulty out of the box and I was able to contact LIFX directly and receive and entire new starter set (now I have three strips and two power bricks). This starter kit feels like it should be priced closer to $50-$60 for what you are getting and if you are spending nearly $100 for a LED light strip I would feel as though you should receive twice the length than what is provided.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great product, can cut to length.
customer_reviews.text: Bright. Easy to install. Excellent app. Mounting adhesive works very well. I only wish there were as many accessories as there are for Phillips hue like an optional physical wall dimmer. I ended up cutting mine to length I needed, which is not recommended by manufacturer. Works just fine though I've seen online not everyone has good results with that. Make sure you don't cut through an LED if you do.
customer_reviews.author: ddufon

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, poor for under-cabinet lighting
customer_reviews.text: Pro: The lights themselves are great, with rich and very controllable colors. Cons: The sticky back on the strip is sadly lacking in stickiness and falls off the underneath of kitchen cabinets. The strips are quite bulky and don't flex horizontally so going around corners is very difficult. Also I have had sections of two strips fail in about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mathumatix

customer_reviews.title: The quality could be a little better. The outer plastic coating on mine has started ...
customer_reviews.text: The LED's are bright and very colorful. The quality could be a little better. The outer plastic coating on mine has started to flake and peel off. I also had to RMA one of the strips as it would freak out and non stop blink. I think it is a little overpriced, but works well in unison with other Lifx products.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Best LED strip avaliable!
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best smart LED strips on the market (if not the best)! Very, very rarely disconnects. I've had this product for many months and have had only two disconnections. The colors are pretty, the quality is good, and no hub is required!
customer_reviews.author: _andrew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Just waiting for an update for better animations. I want some wavy Norther lights effects!
customer_reviews.author: Liam558

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, lots of options
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING, lots of options, but they still need to fix the app and connectivity issues. also music visualizer is the only thing that i haven't gotten to work on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Dao

customer_reviews.title: Once set up really adds to enjoyment of any room
customer_reviews.text: Takes some work to get it to pair with Alexa. Once set up really adds to enjoyment of any room. The different colors are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4x BR30 and light strip in kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Although colors of the light strip are a bit different from BR30's, the combo of 4x BR30 and light-strip above cabinets is an awesome setup. We have an open kitchen that is now officially The Chill Zone.
customer_reviews.author: Kwj

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing, love changing the colors through cove
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, love changing the colors through cove, wish there was better integration with voice through Google home. They can be fun and playful with the music visualizer, or got and steamy when seeing the mood.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Been ordering from Amazon for over 13 years, and this is the first time I've ever written a review. These lights drop connection several times a day, requiring a power cycle to get them reconnected. This is the same for both strips I have purchased. Definitely do not recommend - will be buying the Philips Hue products from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add to any room.
customer_reviews.text: These led strips are great for any room of the house. They offer a wide range for colors and light output. The app also offers various time settings, patters, themes, and effects. I have bought three strips and have them under my sofa and breakfast bar. They work great to enhance the mood of the room and work great as a night light also.
customer_reviews.author: @PaulJTra

customer_reviews.title: It's a good build quality as well as colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought LIFX Z strip and LIFX bulb a week ago. It's a good build quality as well as colors. BUT 1) Half of strip stoped working after 6 days!!! 2) Constantly loses signal, two —three times a day (or even more often). You should always reconnect you strip. The Same issue for LIFX Bulb. DANGER !!! DON'T BUY !!! Red my short review about LIFX bulb:
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: I love these strips when I went to BestBuy to buy the Phillip's light with the bridge and all that the man told me this was better and cheaper and not that much of a hassle and he was right I love them my room looks great
customer_reviews.author: ki

customer_reviews.title: Disconnecting from network problems.
customer_reviews.text: Threw this in the garbage this morning. $90 wasted as far as I'm concerned. Constantly disconnecting from the network forcing me to have to unplug from the wall to reset the connection. I don't write reviews on Amazon very often, but this unreliable product makes me want to warn people away. It is a known issue with many customers complaining of this problem. I even bought a higher end router, thinking my old one was congested with the 10 devices I had. (phone, tablet, Google Home, a couple other Leviton lights) None of my other wi-fi lights are this problematic. I will be looking into a competitor for strip lighting to replace it. Complete. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: These lights installed easily, set-up was a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I already had 8 Lifx bulbs in various places around my house, but had a couple troublesome under-cabinet lighting areas that I never seemed to be able to find the right solution for. These lights installed easily, set-up was a breeze, and a few minutes after opening the package I had nice bright, versatile lighting. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, however the accessories are very limited. Works great in a single run. Bright and very receptive to modifications. Found out you can't segment with wire runs in the middle, as is necessary to put in under cabinet lighting.
customer_reviews.author: ETP

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to my network!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of the bulbs and they work most of the time, I understand that I can't expect perfect connectivity at all times on Wi-Fi devices. However, I purchased the LIFX Z light strip and have never been able to connect it. I even tried plugging it into the same power strip as my router. Additionally, support online for this product is lacking, best to just call the company if that is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great but apparently they don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I love how vibrant the colors are on the light strips they really do light up the room, I placed the light strips on the back of my tv to give my white walls some life. A couple months after the purchase the lights started malfunctioning and changing colors as it wer going into a cycle as well as some of the leds no longer respond to color change
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing issues? No power/functionality
customer_reviews.text: As a BIG fan of Lifx I was terribly disappointed with this kit. It arrived looking fine and all was fine until trying to set it up. Some hardware malfunction rendered it totally dead. No functionality whatsoever, no power. For the cost just unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: macdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Light up your life.
customer_reviews.text: This light strip is fantastic. The colors can be as vivid or as soft as you like. There are a number of preset lighting modes that make your room glow with beautiful colors depending on your mood. Easy installation and setup. I definitely recommend this LIFX light strip for any room in your home.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly limited ability to really control the color. Clunkier to use than I expected from LIFX.
customer_reviews.author: Curt B.

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised but the build quality could use some work.
customer_reviews.text: The lights work great and they really add a nice ambience to my TV (I have them mounted behind it), but the build of the light strips could use some work. The rubberized coating that cover the LEDs is very fragile. If you rub too hard as you are applying pressure to make sure the strips stick to the surface, some of the coating can rub and chip off so to anyone else getting these, use only downward pressure when applying these or use something like a cloth dampened with some rubbing alcohol as you are moving and applying pressure along the strips.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: I must say I'm extremely disappointed in the z strips. I have 6 lifx bulbs that worked fantastically so I decided to get z Strips. Right out of the box 1 strip was not working. I tried trouble shooting and nothing worked. I emailed lifx (customer service by email only which is next to impossible to troubleshoot). These lose connection to wifi constantly and need a reboot. Keep in mind my other lifx bulbs have wifi connection to them. Needless to say very disappointed in both the product and lifx troubleshooting and customer service. I was a supporter of this brand but I think I'll be switching over to Hue.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great light strips
customer_reviews.text: Great light strips. Wish they made L connectors to connect the two strips that will be placed behind my tv.
customer_reviews.author: john nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes this thing gets stuck and won't receive new commands ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes this thing gets stuck and won't receive new commands to change lights. However, I dig it and other LIFX products overall.
customer_reviews.author: V. M.

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive poor, and falls off my wall frequently
customer_reviews.text: Very often fails to connect to my wifi. Adhesive poor, and falls off my wall frequently :(
customer_reviews.author: Scenic Views

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought last year and still can’t get it to work
customer_reviews.author: Lexxxy

customer_reviews.title: Really good!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up, awesome colours, and really like the interface on the app to control the colours too. The strip is organised into different 'sections' which give it a bit more flexibility (I like to have them different colours sometimes). It adds a really cool vibe to the room, I'm definitely thinking about where to put my next one.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and especially wonderful that it is controlled by Alexa
customer_reviews.author: al3mdah

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully they will improve them in the future as I love the LIFX bulbs
customer_reviews.text: One of the strips did not work. I tried updating the firmware, as well as the other suggestions but they never worked. So I returned them. Hopefully they will improve them in the future as I love the LIFX bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip J.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay connect. Always having to unplug and replug to keep connection.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wood

customer_reviews.title: Love the LIFX strip
customer_reviews.text: Added the strip above our fireplace mantle - adds awesome lighting. So many different levels of brightness...not to mention the colors! Easy to add to our home wifi network. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: djerns

customer_reviews.title: Best quality of light and animations for an LED light ...
customer_reviews.text: Best quality of light and animations for an LED light strip. Looks beautiful as an effect behind my TV. I like to set the color to the mood of the movie I'm watching.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described and look great under my cabinets
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3/21 and return window expired 4/21... 4/22 the LIFX will no longer connect to the cloud. The first and second time this occurred it required me to move a heavy TV stand reset and reclaim the light in the LIFX app. LIFX can't expect consumers to repeat this process over and over when all other lights work just fine without additional resets. It doesn't appear that this is ready for prime time. All other devices work without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Panda3k

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cool, integrates well with my android Phone and Echo.
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights, fun, easy to install and pair. I can control them with the Amazon Echo and I love that. I have two different sets and can change colors and control them together with the phone app. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: One stopped working after only 3 hours of use!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2, one has stopped working after only 3 hours of use. Have tried everything possible but no luck! It was delivered to hotel in Orlando while I was on a work trip, however I'm now back at home in Dubai, UAE hence too expensive to return. The one that is working however is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Costello

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Obviously no quality control. Unit ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Obviously no quality control. Unit defective. After reading reviews I am not the only with issues. Another product rushed out and cheaply made by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam gans

customer_reviews.title: Best light strip on earth!!
customer_reviews.text: Between the lifx z smart bulbs and these you can turn any space into the ultimate zen-like experience or rock out!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely buy lifx z again
customer_reviews.text: everything was perfect the packaging was in perfect condition and the led strips works' fine and looked f amazing, I totally loved it
customer_reviews.author: yara

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive failed after a month despite proper installation. Otherwise it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Smuclovisky

customer_reviews.title: The concept and light strips are really cool, however I bought the to tape behind my ...
customer_reviews.text: The concept and light strips are really cool, however I bought the to tape behind my tv. After about a week they began to separate from the sticky glue strip and falling off the tv. I'm about ready to toss them back in the box they came in because I'm sick and tired of pushing them back on the glue strip every couple days to get them to stick to the tv again.
customer_reviews.author: keith loveland

customer_reviews.title: Simple and brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. Have placed them underneath my TV cabinet and they light up the room so well. They are a nice white, not too blue or washed out. It was simple to connect them to the app and simple to use. Like the turn off feature over time.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of Lifx Z strip lights for use as a bookcase illumination in a place I did not have an easily switchable light. They are great... When They work. The strips periodically lose Wi-Fi connection and can no longer be turned on or off. I have reset them multiple times Without a great deal of success. They seem to work fine for a few days then one or the other will again become disconnected. They are no more than 10 feet away from the wireless router. I own multiple affect LIFX bulbs and they work great however the strip lights are great disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get to connect with the app. Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy theSuperStar

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are brighter and do way more than the philips hue! No hub needed!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good when it works. Too buggy for normal use. Drops from WiFi off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Blair R Baertsch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the space
customer_reviews.text: I own a corporate gym and have used the light in our spin room. It has worked so well. Perfect for the space. Our members love the new light and its variance in colours. Absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to connect and use (as have been all ...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to connect and use (as have been all Lifx products). The effects you can generate with the strip are very cool and I like that you can scale the size up/down with the connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought worked great! The second one was in the factory test mode and no matter what I tried couldn't get it out of the mode so it was useless. I would hold up on buying any until they get their quality control right. It is a lot of money to spend for a hit and miss product. Adding this to the review, the first one I bought is now not working. Impossible to contact manufacture. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! This is a waste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stone

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this over priced garbage will not connect to network no matter what i try you have to be an it professional to get this to work. Stay far away. Update somehow after messing with it for 2 hours it started to work moved up to 2 stars for now and updated firmware we shall see how it goes. Another update it constantly falls off the network and im at the point of throwing it in the garbage where it belongs. I have spent countless hours and days trying to get this to work do not buy this!!! It is garbage in every way shape and form.
customer_reviews.author: jv

customer_reviews.title: ... I think the internet bridge is damaged that so sad
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the connection always lost and I think the internet bridge is damaged that so sad
customer_reviews.author: Just MAMDUH

customer_reviews.title: Great light, Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Strip is easy to set up, very versatile with lots of colours to choose from for any room in the house or office. App makes changing the colours simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible support. Could not get this to work
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this connected to my home network. I tried every single WiFi security setting I had available. Opened up a support case and after two days, I get a response that this is a problem with my router. I have no problem connecting anything else to my network. I ordered the Hue and it connected flawlessly and works great. This product for me was complete garbage and is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Really fun and useful. Good for mood lighting, bright enough to light a while room, and really easy to set up. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Nicholas Fazio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! I love the versatility and ability to make different colour combos. Another great LIFX product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half of my lights don't work
customer_reviews.text: Half of the lights do not change when I change it on my phone they just flash different colors continuously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't add strands with the power on!!! Otherwise they're great
customer_reviews.text: My desk is a MONSTER to move. I pulled out the desk, put two strands behind it and moved it back. Lights worked perfectly. Then I reached behind and knocked the last strand loose. When I plugged it back in, it started cycling colors. Followed the steps to reset it, but no luck. It's a known issue. Attempting to get a refund or else a new strand. :(
customer_reviews.author: S122

customer_reviews.title: LIFX lights in strip form - Great for mood lighting
customer_reviews.text: If you need/want the power of regular LIFX bulbs in strip form, this is for you. We have several of their normal bulbs around our house, and this is just as easy to use as the others. We have this on the back of my daughter's long dresser, and it lights up her room wonderfully. It adds a new element to "story time" when we read books. She can choose the color/mood of the background lighting while we read. It appears to be well made and is very well packaged. I'll probably end up getting some for under our kitchen cabinets as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have several LIFX bulbs and was excited to try this item. Such fun to use! Easy to hook up. Very versatile. I can seen the grandkids using it in their Lego buildings / villages. I plan on using it in my sewing room for some fun accent lighting! Great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Sue1212

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects from wifi daily - only flaw and a major one.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the light output was fantastic but the wireless unit would keep falling off my wireless network. Since it plugged in behind my TV, I had to install another wifi plug just to reset it. Lifx needs to seriously re-engineer that device. Side note: all my Lifx wifi bulbs are doing great. I'm sad that the LED strip didn't work out. Thank you Amazon for letting me return this product. I went to a cheaper dumb light strip and I use a Wifi plug to control it ON/OFF.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: choose Phillips that cost the same but work great.
customer_reviews.text: One of the 2 strips is defectous and when looking into the troubleshooting page of the brand I notice this is suppose to happen on some of their units. It is desloyal to sell things that may be defective, specially at this high price (80 bucks for 2x 1 meter RGB ligths and 1x controller). Wouldn't buy again from this brand. And if you are tempted to buy it... choose Phillips that cost the same but work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: The two 3 meter pairs are a little loose when pluggin in together
customer_reviews.text: The warm white colors have a green tint to them so they look green instead of warm white. Less bright than i expected from 1400 lumens. Power cord has a little box right on the middle of the cord... Don't know why they didn't move the box to either end of the power cord. Expensive. EDIT: The green tint has been fixed in new firmware, upgrading to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gasaraki

customer_reviews.title: I'd heard great things about LIFX from those who have their WiFi ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd heard great things about LIFX from those who have their WiFi bulbs. In my case I wanted more subtle effect lighting so I purchased this starter kit to see how it would work. All I can say is awesome! Easy to install right out of the box and very intuitive interface. Lighting effect is the envy of all my visitors (they seriously think I hired a professional and spent thousands). Am going back now to buy more of the strips to extend the setup. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Best light strip on the market to date.
customer_reviews.text: These install easily as long as you connect to the bulb BEFORE you connect to the wifi network yourself. Make certain to connect however many strips concurrently before plugging it in. LifX has a video on where to cut the strip to length if needed. Search their website.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It is controlled seamlessly from the app and can be grouped or put on a schedule like any of the other LIFX bulbs we own
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in time for the Holidays to add lighting to a mantle area where we put Holiday decorations. It is is an ingenious design and setup without any issues. It is controlled seamlessly from the app and can be grouped or put on a schedule like any of the other LIFX bulbs we own. The lighting is so beautiful and transforms the room so much that we will be keeping there year round!
customer_reviews.author: SteveV

customer_reviews.title: Kids really loved it and just can't get enough of painting colors ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not just a strip of light, its a Piece of Art! The themes and color blending are simply superb. Kids really loved it and just can't get enough of painting colors on it. The lights specially look great when reflected on the wall. I have attached it to the rear of my TV and can paint the wall to any color I like. I am ordering more Zs to paint my bedroom walls too !
customer_reviews.author: Mrunmoy Samal

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, Lots of Fun, Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have just installed my Lifx Z and love it. Instal is very straightforward - it sticks to almost any surface without a hassle. Colours are fun and add life to room. I have it under a bay window which works beautifully, adding colour to the main living room. I have a number of Lifx bulbs and find I use the white functions a lot, but less of the colour. With the lifx Z I think it will be the other way round as due to the strip lighting, the colour is more subtle. Controlling through the app is easy and intuitive. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Controllers seem fine - reached out to LIFX tech support via email ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two - of the 4 strips that came with only one worked - experiencing flashing with each individual strip. Controllers seem fine - reached out to LIFX tech support via email - crickets!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: they worked great when I first got them. had connection issues once in a blue moon. but now they won't connect at all and i thought that they would work well with my amazon Echo like it says it does but all you can do is turn them off and on, and dim them. no way to change colors. don't buy these spend the extra couple bucks and buy Phillips Hue.
customer_reviews.author: Will H.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why so many negative reviews, these lights are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are truly amazing and pairs with an intuitive and easy to work with app. I have no idea why there are so many negative reviews. Dont listen. Theyre probably because they couldnt figure out how to bridge them to the wifi. I absolutely love these lights. Little expensive, but worth it for a one time purchase
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: All about those pins..
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, wanted some outside lights for the gazeboo...one complaint...day one extension pins broke just trying to connect strips together...
customer_reviews.author: cowswithguns

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but need more improvements
customer_reviews.text: Overall the LED strips works out of box. The connection with the app takes a few tries but keep trying, it will work eventually. The light is brighter compare to Hue as I have both so I can easily tell. The only negative side of this product is the 3M sticky on the stripe doesn't stick at all. You probably need to find another way to secure the light
customer_reviews.author: Carter Huang

customer_reviews.title: Mood lighting was never better
customer_reviews.text: I so love having this light strip behind my TV. The colors possible are infinite and can be changed to fit any mood!
customer_reviews.author: Gold Acres

customer_reviews.title: Not so Impressed
customer_reviews.text: NOT super impressed...the app is so so. expensive compaired to other LED RGB Light tape and I had a controller failure.
customer_reviews.author: 1sickC6

customer_reviews.title: Easy, colorful accent lighting
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Vibrant accent lighting without a hub to hide. These strips are festive, fun and illuminate areas that are not already wired with lighting to brighten spaces or draw attention. Kids love to decorate their rooms with light – they use the strips as a nightlight and gently wake to increasing brightness in the morning. Installing under outdoor bar next to enhance the ambiance for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the LED Starter Kit and absolutely love it. I have it on my mantel and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the LED Starter Kit and absolutely love it. I have it on my mantel and it really accentuates everything. I love how I can change the colors for the holidays. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: CAL78

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and I love that you can do effects ...
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and I love that you can do effects from tier app and you don't need a 3rd party app.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnybear

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking, these are NO good!
customer_reviews.text: DON’T buy this product. I have a master degree in network engineering and tried everything possible to get these lights to stay connected to my network but they refused to stay connected. They dropped randomly very few minutes. Great when they worked but completely not worth it. Too bad because the brightness and colors were exceptional but come on they have to stay connected or they are worthless. I’d give them zero stars but that’s not an option. Back on the hunt for a strip I can use with my SmartThings network.
customer_reviews.author: DavidMaui

customer_reviews.title: Terrible support
customer_reviews.text: Item only partially works. Their support is flaky at best. One of the light strings doesn't work. However it took weeks for support to figure this out. Apparently it is a general issue with a number of units. Asked for a refund and have not heard back from them. Also the app and connecting to the unit was pretty flaky. I was hoping to connect multiple units but after the issues with this and their slow tech support I have decided to go back to Philips Hue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Law

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These do not stick under your cabinets, they fall down. I even tried to stick on TV and they fell off even with super glue. I ended up sending one back and the other I used automotive glue to finally get it to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine

customer_reviews.title: Check out "Lifx Z Experience Review" at youtube by Amanda Woolsey. She gets to the point about the good and the bad about this.
customer_reviews.text: This is most definitely the best light strip I've seen, and is way brighter than even the hue strips that I was envious of previously. But what really wowed me, was the light pattern theme mode (where each zones in the strip lights up a different colour). Plus being able to "paint" the wall with the app is unexpectly fun and useful. I was quite on the fence about this, but after watching a youtube review of LIFX Z by Amanda Woolsey, I decided to take the plunge. Haven't regretted it so far. I do wish they implement some sort of animation soon. This would really work well on a Christmas tree if it did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome lights!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great! The lights were bright, and the ability to change colours through the app is a game changer! Highly recommended to anyone looking for LED strip lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LIFX Z Wi-Fi Smart LED Light Strip (Base+2 Meters of Strip) Adjustable,Multi Color
product_meta.description: LIFX Z (starter kit) Wi-Fi smart LED light strip (base + 2 meters of strip), adjustable, multicolor, dimmable, no hub required, works with Alexa. With LIFX, how your strip connects is important, so all of our WiFi technology is built right into each base - no hub required. Works with Nest.
feature_bullets: Works with Amazon Alexa to support dimming, shades of white, and color settings through voice control (Alexa device sold separately)
16 million colors and warm to cool whites. Not intended for use in weather-exposed areas
Easy to set up, built in wifi - no hub required
8 user-defined Color/white zones per meter, bright - 700 lumens/meter
Works with Alexa, and Google Assistant
Check user manual under Technical Specification before use

specifications.Special Features: Works with Alexa and the Google Assistant
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars179 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
